en.today: Mercury and Chiron face off today, beloved Aries, magnifying differences in your relationships. Notice if you become agitated or accusatory, and how these behaviors impact your peace. Luckily, the Aquarius moon steps in to bridge gaps, though you'll need to respect other people's opinions. You'll also have a chance to strengthen similarities by celebrating why you were attracted to certain people in the first place. Treat yourself to some alone time once Luna enters Pisces this evening, encouraging you to shed layers and dream. Watch out for intrusive thoughts or disruptive conversations when Uranus stirs later tonight.

en.today: Embrace healing practices and positive affirmations, dear Leo, as Mercury and Chiron face off. Work closely with the divine forces that guide you, taking a spiritual approach toward elevating the heart and mind. The Aquarius moon steps in to highlight your romantic side, bringing fluidity to your relationships. Go where connection flows easily, embracing the soulmates that make your world bright. If you've been struggling with a friend or significant other, consider opening up a dialogue to find a resolution. Allow your emotions to empower you once Luna enters Pisces and squares Uranus, but avoid dramatic peers and unnecessary clashes.

en.today: Be mindful of how you talk to yourself, dear Taurus, as Mercury and Chiron face off. This celestial exchange may cause you to nitpick your own efforts, driving you toward unreasonable expectations. Rather than looking for errors, get organized in your quest for growth. The Aquarius moon steps in to help you establish new structures that will streamline your path to success. You'll also have a chance to gain the respect of peers, especially when you pitch in to assist others. Connect with friends you can be emotionally open with once Luna enters Pisces this evening. Brace for drama online or technological issues while Uranus activates tonight.

en.today: Steer clear of toxic social dynamics, dearest Gemini, as Mercury and Chiron face off. This cosmic climate accentuates how others influence your mood and perspective, asking you to analyze your own contributions to gossip or competition. Luckily, the Aquarius moon steps in to help you take the high road. Lead with love and align yourself with spiritual and moral values that bring out your softer side. A stroke of luck could also emerge when positive interactions are prioritized. Get serious about professional growth once Luna enters Pisces and squares Uranus this evening, recognizing if you've been selling yourself short or given up on goals prematurely.
